items.name: accordion
items.title: accordion
items.description: An accordion allows users to toggle the display of sections of content. Each accordion consists of a header with a title and content area.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: badge
items.title: badge
items.description: A badge is a small label that can be used to display information or status.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: breadcrumbs
items.title: breadcrumbs
items.description: Breadcrumbs display a heirarchy of links to the current page or resource in an application.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: button
items.title: button
items.description: A button allows a user to perform an action, with mouse, touch, and keyboard interactions.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: calendar
items.title: calendar
items.description: A calendar displays one or more date grids and allows users to select either a single date or a contiguous range of dates.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: card
items.title: card
items.description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: checkbox
items.title: checkbox
items.description: A checkbox allows a user to select multiple items from a list of individual items, or to mark one individual item as selected.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: combobox
items.title: combobox
items.description: A combo box combines a text input with a listbox, allowing users to filter a list of options to items matching a query.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: command
items.title: command
items.description: A command palette that allows users to quickly search and execute commands using keyboard shortcuts.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: date-field
items.title: date-field
items.description: A date field allows users to enter and edit date and time values using a keyboard. Each part of a date value is displayed in an individually editable segment.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: date-picker
items.title: date-picker
items.description: A date picker combines one or more DateFields with a calendar popover, allowing users to enter or select a single date/time or a range.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: input
items.title: input
items.description: Allows a user to enter a plain text value with a keyboard.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: menu
items.title: menu
items.description: A menu displays a list of actions or options that a user can choose.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: meter
items.title: meter
items.description: A meter represents a quantity within a known range, or a fractional value.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: modal
items.title: modal
items.description: A modal is an overlay element which blocks interaction with elements outside it.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: popover
items.title: popover
items.description: A popover is an overlay element positioned relative to a trigger.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: radio-group
items.title: radio-group
items.description: A radio group allows a user to select a single option from a list of mutually exclusive options.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: select
items.title: select
items.description: A select displays a collapsible list of options and allows a user to select one of them.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: slider
items.title: slider
items.description: A slider allows a user to select one or more values within a range.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: switch
items.title: switch
items.description: A switch allows a user to turn a setting on or off.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: table
items.title: table
items.description: A table displays data in rows and columns and enables a user to navigate its contents via directional navigation keys, and optionally supports row selection and sorting.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: tabs
items.title: tabs
items.description: Tabs organize content into multiple sections and allow users to navigate between them.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: tag-group
items.title: tag-group
items.description: A tag group is a focusable list of labels, categories, keywords, filters, or other items, with support for keyboard navigation, selection, and removal.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: time-field
items.title: time-field
items.description: A time field allows users to enter and edit time values using a keyboard. Each part of a time value is displayed in an individually editable segment.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: toggle
items.title: toggle
items.description: A toggle button allows a user to toggle a selection on or off, for example switching between two states or modes.
items.author: BaseLayer

items.name: tooltip
items.title: tooltip
items.description: A tooltip displays a description of an element on hover or focus.
items.author: BaseLayer
